plugin.name: Loqui_Practice
plugin.author: Castiel
plugin.description: .----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Loqui Practice Helper... Help | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| |lph help -- Brings up the help section. (What you are reading now) | | | |lph reset <option> -- Resets the given option. Available options: | | classes - Removes all but subclass. | | pracs - Removes prac % from all skills/spells. This | | is also used to "reset" the ability table, | | so call this if you manually add a skill to | | the ability table. | | | |lph classes -- Shows what classes you are flagged as. | |lph addclass <class> -- Adds this class to your remorts. | |lph remclass <class> -- Removes this class from your remorts. | | | |lph excluded -- Shows your excluded abilities. | |lph exclude <spell> -- Adds or removes a skill/spell from the exclude list. | | Excluded abilities will not be practiced. | | | |lph priority -- Shows your priority abilities. | |lph priority <spell> -- Add/remove a skill/spell from the priority list. | | Priority abilities will be practiced first. | | | |lph limit <amount> -- Sets the number of skills/spells that will be | | practiced per 'lph prac'. Range: 1-50. Default 20. | | | |lph prac -- Attempts to practice unpracticed abilities. | '----------------------------------------------------------------------------'

muclient.triggers: <trigger regexp="y" match="^Your new skill level in (?.*?) is (?[0-9]+)\%\.$" enabled="y" sequence="100" omit_from_output="n" script="setSkill"> <trigger regexp="y" match="^You spend (?[0-9]+) practices to increase (?.*?) to (?[0-9]+)\%\.$" enabled="y" sequence="100" omit_from_output="n" script="setSkill"> <trigger regexp="y" match="^You are now an expert in (?.*?)\.$" enabled="y" sequence="100" omit_from_output="n" script="setSkillMax"> <trigger regexp="y" match="^You are already an expert in (?.*?)\.$" enabled="y" sequence="100" omit_from_output="n" script="setSkillMax">
